column4: this is my fstab file http://pastebin.com/d25d970a1 if I change it like that http://pastebin.com/d3159823a is there any problem that may I face?
you need to create the new directories first, they must exist
open a terminal and type   sudo mkdir /media/windows
i think you can do   sudo mount -a   but I don't remember if it will unmount the old ones
